attributes.action: 'YES' to Peel Holdings's development in North Liverpool docks.
attributes.additional_details:
We support Peel Holdings investment of £5.5bn to the re-development and modernisation of North Liverpool city docks in their Liverpool Waters project.

The re-development creates jobs, and growth for the city, and creates a sense of professionalism and prosperity which is infectious throughout the city, the surrounding areas and the many thousands of visitors (business and otherwise) to the city each and every day.

We all say 'YES' to the development plans. Disregarding the possibilities of Liverpool's world heritage site potentially reversing Peel Holding's Liverpool Water's project.
